intro: Aiolon, commonly known as the African daisy, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies, sunflowers, and ragworts. The plant features showy, daisy-like flowers with yellow centers and white to pink petals. It typically grows in grasslands and rocky areas, thriving in full sun. Aiolon is valued for its ornamental beauty and is often used in gardens and floral arrangements.
